title: Ukrainian forces retreat from Sievierodonetsk; Russian forces make gains in eastern Ukraine: Live Ukraine updates
content:
1. Ukrainian forces retreat from Sievierodonetsk; Russian forces make gains in eastern Ukraine: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  2. Ukraine-Russia War News: Ukrainian Forces Will Withdraw From Sievierodonetsk  The New York Times
  3. Ukraine to withdraw from key city of Severodonetsk as Russia's advance grinds on  CNN
  4. The war in Ukraine has entered a new, and more difficult, phase  The Guardian
  5. Ukrainian forces will have to leave key eastern city, Luhansk governor says; retired Russian major captured  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ウクライナ軍がシエビエロドネツクから撤退、ロシア軍がウクライナ東部で優勢に。ウクライナの最新情報
乌克兰军队从西耶罗多涅茨克撤退；俄罗斯军队在乌克兰东部取得进展。乌克兰实时更新
烏克蘭軍隊從西耶羅多涅茨克撤退；俄羅斯軍隊在烏克蘭東部取得進展。烏克蘭實時更新
